thread.title: The Mystery of ISIS’ Toyota Army Solved
thread.title_full: The Mystery of ISIS’ Toyota Army Solved

author: Grizz1
title: The Mystery of ISIS’ Toyota Army Solved
text: Posts: 973 The Mystery of ISIS Toyota Army Solved The US Treasury has recently opened an inquiry about the so-called Islamic States (ISIS/ISIL) use of large numbers of brand-new Toyota trucks. The issue has arisen in the wake of Russias air operations over Syria and growing global suspicion that the US itself has played a key role in arming, funding, and intentionally perpetuating the terrorist army across Syria and Iraq. Just last year it was reported that the US State Department had been sending in fleets of specifically Toyota-brand trucks into Syria to whom they claimed was the Free Syrian Army. Further in.... The mystery of how hundreds of identical, brand-new ISIS-owned Toyota trucks have made it into Syria is solved. Not only has the US and British government admitted in the past to supplying them, their military forces and intelligence agencies ply the borders of Turkey, Jordan, and even Iraq where these fleets of trucks must have surely passed on their way to Syria  even if other regional actors supplied them. While previous admissions to supplying the vehicles implicates the West directly, that nothing resembling interdiction operations have been set up along any of these borders implicates the West as complicit with other parties also supplying vehicles to terrorists inside of Syria. What else has Obama given them? Location: Chicago Posts: 6,628 It's another stupid CIA plan, they have obviously planted homing devices in these trucks so we can have drones obliterate them. The could have at least bought American. No joke. Toyota? That'll upset the Unions.... Thanks from Sabcat and Grizz1 Quote: Originally Posted by Grizz1 The US Treasury has recently opened an inquiry about the so-called “Islamic State’s” (ISIS/ISIL) use of large numbers of brand-new Toyota trucks. The issue has arisen in the wake of Russia’s air operations over Syria and growing global suspicion that the US itself has played a key role in arming, funding, and intentionally perpetuating the terrorist army across Syria and Iraq. Just last year it was reported that the US State Department had been sending in fleets of specifically Toyota-brand trucks into Syria to whom they claimed was the “Free Syrian Army.” Further in.... The mystery of how hundreds of identical, brand-new ISIS-owned Toyota trucks have made it into Syria is solved. Not only has the US and British government admitted in the past to supplying them, their military forces and intelligence agencies ply the borders of Turkey, Jordan, and even Iraq where these fleets of trucks must have surely passed on their way to Syria – even if other regional actors supplied them. While previous admissions to supplying the vehicles implicates the West directly, that nothing resembling interdiction operations have been set up along any of these borders implicates the West as complicit with other parties also supplying vehicles to terrorists inside of Syria. What else has Obama given them? The New Eastern Outlook is a propaganda arm of Russian government. Throughout the article, all Syrian opposition groups are referred to as "terrorists." That makes sense only if you're Russian and support Assad. It's a damned mess in Syria, but the Free Syrian Army allied with a number of other groups are the "moderate" force. Read up: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Free_Syrian_Army In addition, Russian aircraft have been pounding FSA positions around Homs, Latakia, and Aleppo, and thus weakening the opposition to Assad AND ISIS. Here's what happened. You got snookered ol' boy. Russian propagandists know they can count on ill-informed people, and in the US, those who are infected and blinded by the anger and fear that are the primary symptoms of Obama Derangement Syndrome, you know, boys like you. They gotcha. The mystery is solved. Last edited by imaginethat; October 9th, 2015 at 07:14 PM .
